head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HALPERIN, JEROME R., ESQ.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HALPERIN, JEROME R., ESQ.

block.p: HALPERIN--Jerome R., Esq. Died peacefully at home on April 4, 2007, after a long illness. Husband of Judith; former husband of Marleen. Devoted father to Spence, Preston, Guy, Alana, Martine, Kyle and Blake. Cherished grandfather to 13: Jared, Elan, Micaela, Chiara, Braeden, Chase, Aria, Graham, Anders, Terren, Brett, Cameron and Greyson. For Shiva information call 212-751-7555.
